attributes.background: the referendum result was in favour of leaving the EU. if the politicians that were elected and agreed to honour the result fail to allow the UK to leave the EU on the 29th March they have clearly lied to the electorate and as such have betrayed the people of the United Kingdom and democracy

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
